contactForm.warnHttp: Attention: The page was accessed via HTTP. All data you enter in this form will be transmitted unencrypted over the Internet. The form can only be used with a secure HTTPS connection.
contactForm.name: Name*:
contactForm.submitDone: Thanks for your contact request. Your request has been registered in the system and I will process it and get back to you as soon as possible.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
error.nonSuccessResponse: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
error.cantSubmit: The request has failed. Please try again later.
error.captchaError: An error occurred during the Captcha verification.
error.captchaExpired: The captcha has expired. Please fill it out again.
error.captchaInsufficient: You did not pass the Captcha check, please try again.
